Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: Late yesterday, Murali said he talked to David and this this is not considered a must fix.

Action.author: habpy
Action.body: Issue also manifests itself if `chain code`Â is changed slightly, e.g. removing a comment even if paths are identical. Changing version or id is not ideal, because when working with CouchDB all data are lost.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 what do think the disposition should be for this ?

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: I don't think this is a bug. I think perhaps the documentation could be clearer in that PATH is supposed to be the actual chaincode package.
